content: if you like this pattern you ll probably like my cozy knitting newsletter https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/936047/120780277461025946/share too subscribers get early access to test knits exclusive discounts and news from around the knittingverse **pattern notes** late winter is the quiet time of the year the winter holidays are over it s dark and the cold is everywhere it s a good time to turn inwards to take stock and to gather our strength for the growth and newness of the spring to come winter invites is to be patient to plan and work with care and to sow our gardens with the seeds that we want to see take root in the coming year the winter garden sweater is knit with sport weight yarn at a loose gauge which gives it a lovely drape and warmth it has a boat neck a st john s wort lace hem and a cropped shape that s perfect for layering over dresses and high waist jeans like a winter garden it is quiet beautiful and practical it also uses a fairly minimal amount of yarn so if you have some skeins that you thought were not quite enough for a sweater this may be the pattern for you **sizes** 32 36 40 44 48 \ 52 56 60 64 68\ inch chest circumference this sweater is designed to be worn with 0-3 of positive ease #sizeinclusive **yarn** sport or dk weight approx 700 750 900 \ 1050 1200\ yards **thank you** to my fabulous test knitters the winter garden sweater is now available in german translation by chantal vogel
